text: Hi, I added a new dropdown menu (Under Resources) in my navigation, and my styles aren't applying to a menu list. How can I fix this? <https://www.cckb.biz/>
You shoudl be able to give that Module a Label in the DM
Yeah, it has a Label in the DM. And that label shows in the Modules pane…but not when editing the module.
Herm.. weird. seems like and oversite
Yeah. Maybe an easy fix. I should  also mention, this ‘back link’ is something you see within repeater fields in a module.
Not a big deal, but would be nice to see the pretty name.
